doc.title: Desiree: Now We Are Talking
doc.plot: Desiree - Now We're Talking! Desiree is a talk show that keeps you on the edge with riveting topics, commentary, and interviews. Desiree encourages her guests to speak in her tag-line No we are are talking! where she gets those to open up. Her beauty matched with her charm makes it easy to talk about whats on your mind, from todays issues to tomorrow to politics to an open forum via call ins and email! Everyone has a voice with Desiree - Now We are Talking!
